overview:
Tim Nguyen brings over 10 years of software development experience to his role as co-founder and CIO of Avidian Technologies. Currently, he is responsible for Avidianâ€™s overall IT strategy and product development.

Prior to Avidian, Tim was the Principal Technical Architect for Meritage Technologies. In this position, he was responsible for technology architecture, solution design, team development and deployment. Before Meritage, he helped organizations such as Microsoft, Cybercamps and Avatar Interactive develop commercial e-commerce Web sites and initiatives.

Tim also spent time in the Application Development Group at Avaya Communications (a former Lucent Technologies subsidiary). While there, he designed and developed n-tier enterprise level applications that leveraged leading edge technologies.
